title: Erikson on Erikson: on child care
creator_credit: Parents' Magazine Films and Thomas Sand
brief_description: Follows a discussion between psychologist, Dr Erikson, and a group of student preschool teachers on various child care problems, and the factors necessary for optimal child care.
description: Follows a discussion between psychologist, Dr Erikson, and a group of student preschool teachers on various child care problems, and the factors necessary for optimal child care.
